Text: Re Contact GM Corp Alternate Fuel VehiclesDear Mr Taylor Thank you for contacting the Internet Response Center and we apologize for the delay in our response We appreciate your interest in General Motors and alternative fuel technology We would suggest that you direct your inquiry to the following address GM Advanced Technology Vehicles MC Technology Drive Troy MI You may also contact Juanita Kukla our Public Relations Manager for HybridElectric Vehicles at the following email address with your request Thank you again for contacting the Internet Response Center and for your interest in General Motors We hope you are able to obtain the information you are seeking regarding ZEV credits Sincerely Donald Stailey Customer Relationship Manager GM Internet Response Center Original message follows Name michael taylor Address smith street Address suite EB B City houston StateProvince TX Country USA ZIPPostal Code Phone Day Phone Evening Email Address Message I work for Enron and we will be recieving some ZEV credits for CA I would like to talk to somebody concerning electric vechile credits for the state of CA Browser Mozilla compatible MSIE Windows NT
